  • Method Details

    • takeSnapshot

      public static void takeSnapshot(String arenaName, org.bukkit.Location pos1, org.bukkit.Location pos2, Consumer<ArenaSnapshotModel> onComplete)
      Captures an ArenaSnapshot of the given region asynchronously using Z-slice batching.
      Parameters:
      arenaName - name of the arena (for logs)
      pos1 - one corner of the cuboid
      pos2 - opposite corner of the cuboid
      onComplete - callback when the snapshot is fully captured
